product_description: McCormick Basil Leaves have an aromatic, sweet flavor that blends well with garlic and tomatoes. This pantry staple is essential in so many of your family’s favorite recipes, including pizza, pasta, marinara sauce and minestrone. You won’t find a more versatile herb than basil. This member of the mint family carries a fresh, green aroma with a hint of sweet licorice. Basil is delicious in everything from spaghetti sauce to roasted meats, soups and salads. You’ll also enjoy it in recipes for marinated olives, Italian sausage and peppers or Tuscan beef stew. McCormick Basil Leaves are gently dried for flavor, color and aroma. Rub the leaves between your fingers before adding it to your dish to release the flavorful oils and superb fragrance.

product_description: Sometimes referred to as the ‘King of the Herbs,’ sweet basil is a staple in Southern European food and one of the most widely used herbs in the world. Our Spice Islands sweet basil is sourced from California, known for its particularly flavorful basil. The basil is machine-harvested and dried to preserve its color and aroma. The result is a much cleaner product with a robust taste and fresh green color.

name: McCormick Culinary Basil Leaves, 5 oz - One 5 Ounce Container of Dried Basil Seasoning with Authentic, Fresh Flavor, Pairs Well with Pasta, Pizzas, Poultry, Sauces and More
short_description: VIBRANT BASIL FLAVOR: McCormick Culinary Basil Leaves are aromatic herbs that highlight mint and anise flavors; notes of pepper and sweetness add depth and complexity to many of your favorite recipes
HIGH QUALITY HERB: Culinary-grade basil is carefully sourced, harvested and dried to retain the herb's natural aroma and color; like fresh basil leaves, dried herbs deliver authentic flavor
PERFECT FOR CHEFS: Sourced explicitly for chefs, basil leaves are available in 5-ounce plastic shakers that are perfect to have on hand for back-of-house, waitstaff, buffet lines or tabletops
VERSATILE: Basil leaves pair perfectly with sauces, poultry, pizzas and pasta; experiment with basil as a garnish or essential element in various recipes; enhance your dishes with dried basil

A BRAND YOU CAN TRUST: Garnish your meals with confidence; McCormick Culinary's Basil Leaves contain no added MSG and is kosher to help you accommodate all guests with delicious, safe food and pure flavor
product_description: Dried basil spice comes from the fresh herb grown worldwide and renowned for its peppery, sweet flavor. McCormick Culinary Basil Leaves have a finish that carries subtle mint and anise notes along with black pepper. You'll love basil seasoning because it retains its natural aroma and color while delivering stellar flavor in all your favorite dishes. Use McCormick Culinary Basil Leaves to top delicious, hand-crafted pizza, season a roast chicken with a combination of herbs or enhance the flavor of tomato-based sauces. This dried basil seasoning has a sweet, aromatic flavor that pairs well with tomatoes and garlic. As a pantry staple, dried basil leaves are essential in many of your family's favorite recipes, including minestrone, marinara sauce and pasta. Basil leaves are crucial for various culinary creations. Classic pesto recipes use dried basil spice alongside olive oil, garlic and parmesan. Other popular recipes that call for dried basil spice include Morissa Gazpacho, caprese salad, grilled shrimp wraps, fresh basil vinaigrette, margherita pizza, tomato basil soup, tomato basil salad, tomato basil pasta, everything basil pizza, homemade pasta marinara and black pepper, strawberry and basil mocktails. Basil leaves come ready for use in various dishes — no preparation necessary. Use as much or as little as you want with convenient spoon or shaker dispensing options.
